name: godbot
updateMsg1: 4.12.0 Small fixes and added the >makevote command.
updateMsg2: 4.11.4 Fixed several chatContest bugs and chatCombos now won't reset anymore when the bot restarts. Improved logging for gold updates.
updateMsg3: 4.11.3 Games generated with the >minesweeper command will now start with one unvealed zero.
description: The 'GodBot' bot code, created for the unofficial Discord server of web and mobile game Godville.
